game.name: Train Simulator: GWR 4200/5205/7200 2-8-0T Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Step into the cab of a trio of Great Western Railway’s hard-working tank engines, the original 4200, improved 5205 and huge 7200 classes, all brought to life in Train Simulator by Victory Works!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Step into the cab of a trio of Great Western Railway’s hard-working tank engines, the original 4200, improved 5205 and huge 7200 classes, all brought to life in Train Simulator by Victory Works!
